sentences.en: A free trade agreement would be advantageous to both countries.
sentences.cn: 自由贸易协定对两国都会有利。

sentences.en: After three years'expectation that things would mend , I accepted an advantageous offer from Captain William Prichard.
sentences.cn: 这样过了三年,时来运转已经绝望, 我于是接受了威廉·普利查船长的优厚待遇的聘请.

sentences.en: An ear for foreign languages is advantageous.
sentences.cn: 能够听懂外语是种优势。

sentences.en: By a series of rapid movements the general placed his forces in an advantageous position.
sentences.cn: 借着一连串的迅速调动,将军将他的军队置于有利的地位.

sentences.en: Creosote thus possesses a variety of advantageous properties.
sentences.cn: 这样,防腐油就具有各种很好的性能.

sentences.en: Free exchange of goods was advantageous to all.
sentences.cn: 商品自由交换惠泽八方。

sentences.en: He was now in a more advantageous position.
In certain circumstances, other theorems may be advantageous or even indispensable.
sentences.cn: 在某种情况下, 用其它定理可能是有利的,甚至是不可缺少的.

sentences.en: Injections of vitamin C are obviously advantageous.
sentences.cn: 注射维生素C显然是有利的.

sentences.en: It is generally advantageous to sow pasture seeds with a companion grazing nurse crop.
sentences.cn: 一般在播种草种时,同时播种放牧保护作物是有好处的.

sentences.en: It is highly advantageous to us.
sentences.cn: 这对我们极为有利. advantageously

sentences.en: It therefore becomes an advantageous method that can be easily implemented.
sentences.cn: 这个方法既有成效,也易于取得结果.

sentences.en: The heterogeneity and uneven development of China's economy are rather advantageous in the war of resistance.
sentences.cn: 中国经济的不统一、不平衡,对于抗日战争反为有利.

sentences.en: The trade agreements advantageous to both countries.
sentences.cn: 贸易协定将对签约两国都有利.

sentences.en: What is disadvantageous to John may be advantageous to Henry.
sentences.cn: 对约翰不利的事情也许对亨利有利.

sentences.en: You're in a very advantageous position.
sentences.cn: 你处于非常有利的地位.

words.tran_cn: 得天独厚的；有利的；占有利位置的
有利的,优惠的,方便的,幸运的

trans.tran_en: helpful and likely to make you successful
